item.title: A Metaphysical Study of Covid-19
item.description: (Disclaimer: I’m not the right person to give any medical advice, see a doctor instead. This article is largely based on theories that are not proven by modern science, so please read it as a fiction if you want, do not draw any conclusion from it, and do not do anything based on this article.) The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance; it is the illusion of knowledge.
